title: Fix the Bugs
description:
Debug a program with multiple errors and get it working correctly.

The program should:
1. Ask for a user's age
2. Calculate years until age 100
3. Display a message

But it has several bugs! Find and fix all of them.

Expected behavior:
Input: 25
Output: You will turn 100 in 75 years!
starterCode:
# This program has bugs - fix them!

age = input("Enter your age: ")
years_left = 100 - age
print(f"You will turn 100 in {years_left} years!)
solution:
# Fixed program

age = int(input("Enter your age: "))
years_left = 100 - age
print(f"You will turn 100 in {years_left} years!")
hints: input() returns a string - you need to convert it to an integer
Check that all strings are properly closed with matching quotes
Make sure you're using int() to convert the age input
The error messages from Python will guide you to the problems
